title: Alex Wayne on Scaramucci (Audio)
itunes:title: Alex Wayne on Scaramucci (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo) \u0010\u0010Alex Wayne, Bloomberg News White House Team Leader, discusses President Trump removing Anthony Scaramucci from White House role as Communications Director.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
